explanation: The stage direction describes the setting of the play, specifically the interior of a café with busts of famous men including Molière. This falls under the 'setting' category as it is a description of the stage and play location.
stgdir: Le théâtre représente l'intérieur d'un café, dans lequel on voit les bustes de quelques grands hommes, ni entr'autres celui de Molière.
